description: This file defines a React functional component named DeviceTable that displays a list of devices with features such as search, filter, sort, pagination, and device actions like delete and ping. It manages state for device data, filters, sorting, pagination, and modal dialogs, and interacts with external APIs for device management.

methods.name: DeviceTable
methods.description: React functional component that renders a table of devices with controls for search, filter, sort, pagination, and device actions.

methods.name: fetchData
methods.description: Fetches device data from the API based on current filters, sorting, and pagination.

methods.name: onSortClick
methods.description: Handles sorting logic when a column header is clicked, toggling between ascending and descending order.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Sets the state to open the delete confirmation dialog for a specific device.

methods.name: confirmDeleteAction
methods.description: Confirms and executes device deletion via API, then refreshes the device list.

methods.name: onPing
methods.description: Pings a device if monitoring is enabled, updates UI to show ping status, and refreshes device data.
